MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-DEC-2020 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Glasgow Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.27am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required following damage by a 3rd party and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:26pm on Monday 7th December 2020.
